dmca.title: Re: Your web site "Mitsubishisucks.com" : Hanawa etc. pages
dmca.body:
Center for Research
Allied POWs Under the Japanese
199 First Street,3rd Floor
Los Altos CA 94022
650-941-2037
www.mansell.com

February 19, 2004

Kamal Sinha
2238 Curtis Street, #C
Berkeley, CA 94702-1826

Ref: Your web site "Mitsubishisucks.com": Hanawa etc. pages

Dear Mr. Sinha,

We note that you have copied our web site that represent many hours of our research, compilation and effort to document the Allied POWS of the Japanese. We do not consider your simply copying our work product as "fair use" in any manner.

You cannot copy our work product, place it in your web pages and merely state that we produced the work product. You have not asked nor have we given you permission to copy our work product nor do we normally grant such permission.

You may link to our web pages at your pleasure. You cannot represent our work as your work in any manner, shape or form, regardless of attribution or acknowledgement that we are the source.

Please remove these pages at once from your web site and acknowledge that you have done so within the next fifteen (15) days. Failure to do so will result in legal action.

With regards,

Roger Mansell
Director
dmca.principal_name: Center for Research,  Allied POWs Under the Japanese
